theory.brief: Câu tường thuật (Reported Speech) dùng để kể lại lời nói của người khác. Thay đổi thì động từ (lùi một thì), đại từ, và từ chỉ thời gian. 'Said' dùng khi không có tân ngữ, 'told' cần có tân ngữ (me/you/him/her/us/them).
examples: Direct: 'It's broken.' → Reported: The doctor said it was broken.
Direct: 'You have to go.' → Reported: Dad told me I had to go.
Direct: 'I'm going tomorrow.' → Reported: She said she was going the next day.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "It's broken." (The doctor) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: The doctor said it was broken
acceptedAnswers: The doctor said it was broken
The doctor said it was broken.
The doctor said that it was broken
The doctor said that it was broken.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "I'm not staying at home." (Tommy) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: Tommy said he wasn't staying at home
acceptedAnswers: Tommy said he wasn't staying at home
Tommy said he wasn't staying at home.
Tommy said he was not staying at home
Tommy said that he wasn't staying at home.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "I'm hungry." (He) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
acceptedAnswers: He said he was hungry
He said he was hungry.
He said that he was hungry
He said that he was hungry.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "I feel ill." (She) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
acceptedAnswers: She said she felt ill
She said she felt ill.
She said that she felt ill
She said that she felt ill.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "We're going to the zoo." (They) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: They said they were going to the zoo
acceptedAnswers: They said they were going to the zoo
They said they were going to the zoo.
They said that they were going to the zoo
They said that they were going to the zoo.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "You have to go to school." (Dad / me) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: Dad told me I had to go to school
acceptedAnswers: Dad told me I had to go to school
Dad told me I had to go to school.
Dad told me that I had to go to school
Dad told me that I had to go to school.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "I'm resting in hospital." (Fiona / me) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: Fiona told me she was resting in hospital
acceptedAnswers: Fiona told me she was resting in hospital
Fiona told me she was resting in hospital.
Fiona told me that she was resting in hospital
Fiona told me that she was resting in hospital.

exercises.instruction: Câu trực tiếp: "You need to study harder." (The teacher / us) → Viết lại thành câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: The teacher told us we needed to study harder
acceptedAnswers: The teacher told us we needed to study harder
The teacher told us we needed to study harder.
The teacher told us that we needed to study harder
The teacher told us we had to study harder
The teacher told us we had to study harder.

exercises.question: They __________ they were going home.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'said' khi không có tân ngữ

exercises.question: He __________ us the story was true.
The teacher __________ the lesson was difficult.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'said' khi không có tân ngữ

exercises.question: "I am tired." → She said she __________ tired.
exercises.explanation: Present simple 'am' đổi thành past simple 'was'

exercises.question: "We are studying." → They said they __________ studying.
"I can help you." → He said he __________ help me.
"I will come tomorrow." → She said she __________ come the next day.
"I don't like coffee." → He said he __________ like coffee.
exercises.explanation: Present simple negative đổi thành past simple

exercises.instruction: "I'm happy." (Tom said) → Viết lại câu tường thuật
acceptedAnswers: Tom said he was happy
Tom said he was happy.
Tom said that he was happy

exercises.instruction: "I can't find my book." (She said) → Viết lại câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: She said she couldn't find her book
acceptedAnswers: She said she couldn't find her book
She said she couldn't find her book.
She said she could not find her book

exercises.instruction: "You have to help me." (He told me) → Viết lại câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: He told me I had to help him
acceptedAnswers: He told me I had to help him
He told me I had to help him.
He told me that I had to help him

exercises.question: "I'm going home tomorrow." → She said she was going home __________.
"I saw him today." → He said he had seen him __________.
"We're leaving tonight." → They said they were leaving __________.
"I'm working now." → She said she was working __________.

exercises.instruction: "I'm feeling better now." (The patient) → Viết lại câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: The patient said he was feeling better then
acceptedAnswers: The patient said he was feeling better then
The patient said he was feeling better then.
The patient said she was feeling better then

exercises.instruction: "I can't come to school tomorrow." (Tom told the teacher) → Viết lại câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: Tom told the teacher he couldn't come to school the next day
acceptedAnswers: Tom told the teacher he couldn't come to school the next day
Tom told the teacher he couldn't come to school the next day.
Tom told the teacher he could not come to school the next day

exercises.instruction: "We're having a party next week." (They) → Viết lại câu tường thuật
exercises.correctSentence: They said they were having a party the next week
acceptedAnswers: They said they were having a party the next week
They said they were having a party the next week.
They said they were having a party the following week

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'He said me he was tired.'
options: He told me he was tired
He said me he was tired
He say me he was tired
He tells me he was tired
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'told' (không phải 'said') khi có tân ngữ (me)
hints: Không dùng 'said me', phải dùng 'told me'

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'She told she was happy.'
exercises.explanation: 'Told' cần có tân ngữ. Không có tân ngữ thì dùng 'said'

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'They said they are going home.'
options: They said they were going home
They said they are going home
They say they are going home
They told they were going home
exercises.explanation: Trong câu tường thuật, present tense đổi thành past tense

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'He told me he can swim.'
options: He told me he could swim
He told me he can swim
He said me he could swim
He tells me he can swim
exercises.explanation: 'can' đổi thành 'could' trong câu tường thuật

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'He said he is feeling better.'
options: He said he was feeling better
He said he is feeling better
He says he is feeling better
He told he was feeling better
exercises.explanation: Present continuous 'is feeling' đổi thành past continuous 'was feeling'

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'She told to me she was busy.'
options: She told me she was busy
She told to me she was busy
She said to me she was busy
She tells me she was busy
exercises.explanation: 'told' theo sau trực tiếp bởi tân ngữ, không có 'to'
